EmailTemplate.description: Sends Customer Satisfaction Survey on Retail Boat Sale - Delivered
EmailTemplate.name: ERP Cust Sat Survey EN
EmailTemplate.subject: Let us know how we did {!AcctSeed__Project__c.AcctSeed__Account__c} !
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!AcctSeed__Project__c.AcctSeed__Account__c},
Thank you for choosing Legend Boats!
We are always working to make your ownership experience as amazing as possible, so we would love to hear from you.
This survey is only 7 questions short and shouldn't take more than a couple of minutes to complete. Your feedback is very important to us and we promise that every comment will be used to help create the best memories possible!
Thank you so much for your time. Happy Boating!
